name: Frankie - PDF Pattern
description:
Twin sized quilt 68"x85"

Materials Needed:
10 fat quarters
3.5 yards solid white
3/4 yard for binding

*I don't list requirements for backing because there are so many different ways to back a quilt.  Please feel free to email me if you have any questions regarding backing*

This pattern will be emailed to you immediately upon purchase.

www.forthelovequilts.blogspot.com

name: Shelby - PDF Pattern
description:
Baby 40"x40"

Materials Needed:
3 Charm Packs
OR your favorite scraps
1 1/4 yard white (background)
1 1/4 yard print (back)
1/2 yard for binding
*a walking foot is required*

This pattern will be emailed to you immediately upon purchase.
www.forthelovequilts.blogspot.com

name: Zooey - PDF Pattern in 3 sizes
description:
Materials Needed:

Baby 40"x40"
4 fat quarters (center) large scale print
4 fat quarters (border) prints or solids
1/2 yard solid white

Lap 60"x60"
5 fat quarters (center) large scale prints
9 fat quarters (border) prints or solids
3/4 solid white

Twin 60"x80"
6 fat quarters (center) large scale prints
9 fat quarters (border) prints or solids
1 yard solid white

*I don't list requirements for backing because there are so many different ways to back a quilt.  Please feel free to email me if you have any questions regarding backing*

This pattern will be emailed to you immediately upon purchase.
www.forthelovequilts.blogspot.com

54"x66" Lap Size
*very easy to size up
